meanings.definition: Isobutenes: a group of hydrocarbons with the formula C4H8
meanings.sent1: The scientist studied isobutenes in the lab.
meanings.sent2: Isobutenes are commonly found in petroleum products.
meanings.sent3: The isobutenes in the beaker seemed to dance under the microscope.
meanings.sent4: Her mind was a complex web of thoughts, much like the structure of isobutenes.
meanings.sent5: The smell of isobutenes lingered in the air, reminding him of his chemistry class.

meanings.definition: Isobutenes: a type of compound used in the production of various chemicals and fuels
meanings.sent1: The factory workers handled isobutenes with caution.
meanings.sent2: Isobutenes play a crucial role in the manufacturing industry.
meanings.sent3: The chef accidentally added isobutenes instead of salt to the recipe.
meanings.sent4: The isobutenes flowed through the pipes like a river of possibilities.
meanings.sent5: The bright yellow color of isobutenes stood out among the other chemicals in the lab.
